# Escaped pipes

The \-character will be considered as an escape in table cell
    if it is followed by a |-character, a \-character or an n.

## They are the future

_Given_ they have arrived

| |æ\n   | \o
o\   |
|--------|---------|
| \|a\\n | ø\
ø\   |

## They are the past

_Given_ they have left

| |æ\   | \o\o\   |
|-------|---------|
| \|a\\ | ø\\ø\   |
